EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_Cloud Foundry Summit_2015.Follow Up Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Cloud Foundry Summit 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for visiting Pivotal at Cloud Foundry Summit <http://pivotal.io/cfsummit>. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers.
Real customers who have deployed both Cloud Foundry and Pivotal Cloud Foundry showed up to share their successes to an enthusiastic audience of 1,500+ developers and operators.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Pivotal customer and team presentations can be found here <http://pivotal.io/cfsummit> - Pivotal’s Cloud Foundry Summit Wrap-up By The Numbers: A Cloud Foundry Summit 2015 Recap <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/news-2/by-the-numbers-a-cloud-foundry-summit-2015-recap> - James Watters and Joshua McKenty Welcome You to the Cloud-Native Enterprise <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xA-674cNI3w> - Andrew Clay Shafer talks Devops, Microservices, and Platforms - oh my! <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rX4mQHPWuUY> - Allstate Insurance Company shares their story in Developing the Freedom to Disrupt <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04QFKBt6LCI>
Want more? Stay in touch with Pivotal and join the conversation on our blogs <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal>, podcasts <http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal>, and on Twitter <https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
The Pivotal Team
